tool_description: Video optimization, Turn your videos into smaller, faster, lower-cost versions of themselves.
name: Beamr Cloud
title: Beamr Cloud

api_list.name: /v1/jobs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beamr-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/v1/jobs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beamr-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://beamr-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/v1/jobs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beamr-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
